post.title: powershot sd600 shutter speed
post.content: in low light, my sd600 gives me a camera shake warning and the shutter speed (ie 1/10). however, some times in the area where the shutter speed shows up i get 0"3, or 0"5, or 1" or another variation. is this shutter speed? seconds, distance, what?perimpro@comcast.net
